entries.MST_FROGATE1_DESC:
There's nothing special about Noel's first implementation,
but the enemies do grow stronger over time,
so even novices may challenge it.
entries.MST_FROGATE2_DESC:
A new trial program for challengers who seek basic battle practice.
Even new Summoners can use it to test their strength
and collect experience.
entries.MST_FROGATE3_DESC:
A trial program exclusive to Earth Units.
How will you beat your foes under such conditions?
Here, your summoning skills will be tested.
entries.MST_FROGATE4_DESC:
A trial program exclusive to Fire Units.
How will you beat your foes under such conditions?
Here, your summoning skills will be tested.
entries.MST_FROGATE5_DESC:
A trial program exclusive to Dark Units.
How will you beat your foes under such conditions?
Here, your summoning skills will be tested.
